Bishan Park Skating Rink.address: 1380 Ang Mo Kio Ave 1, Singapore 569930, inside Bishan-Ang Mo Kio Park

Hi Roller Indoor Skating Rink.address: 1 Pasir Ris Cl, Level 5 E!Hub @ Downtown East #05-104, Singapore 519599
Hi Roller Indoor Skating Rink.hours: Open from 11am - 6pm on weekdays except Fridays, and from 3pm - 10pm on weekends. On Fridays, it is open from 12:30pm - 7:30pm.
Hi Roller Indoor Skating Rink.price: $12 on weekdays and $15 on weekends for a slot, each slot is 2 hours. You can spectate the people in the rink for $5 a slot. Indoor (inside the skating rink) skate rentals are $6 for 2 hours. You can get your tickets .
